TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LoadOptions extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定分析 XML 时的加载选项。

span.span: Specifies load options when parsing XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在加载时保留空白区域，在 XML 树中按原样具体化 XML 树中的所有无用空格。If you preserve white space when loading, all insignificant white space in the XML tree is materialized in the XML tree as is. 如果不保留空白区域，则丢弃所有无意义的空白。If you do not preserve white space, then all insignificant white space is discarded. 如果您设置 SetBaseUri 和 SetLineInfo 标志，则对性能产生负面影响。There is a performance penalty if you set the SetBaseUri and the SetLineInfo flags. 在加载 XML 文档之后立即是准确的基 URI 和行信息。The base URI and the line information are accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，基 URI 和行信息可能变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the base URI and line information may become meaningless. 如果基础没有基 URI 或行的信息，设置 SetBaseUri 和标志将具有的 SetLineInfo 不起作用。If the underlying does not have base URI or line information, setting the SetBaseUri and the SetLineInfo flags will have no effect. 此类型可控制如何 LINQ to XML 处理时加载或分析的空白区域。This type allows you to control how LINQ to XML handles white space when loading or parsing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 此示例从设置选项设置基 URI 和保留行信息的文件加载一个小型 XML 树。This example loads a small XML tree from a file, setting the options to set base URI and retain line information. 然后，它将添加没有行信息的另一个元素。It then adds another element that does not have line information. 然后，它将打印在树中的每个元素的行信息。It then prints the line information for each element in the tree. ```csharp string markup = @" "; File.WriteAllText("Test.xml", markup); XElement po = XElement.Load("Test.xml", LoadOptions.SetBaseUri | LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); // add a node to the tree. // the newly added node will not have line information. po.Element("Child2").AddAfterSelf(new XElement("Child3")); string[] splitUri = po.BaseUri.Split('/'); Console.WriteLine("BaseUri: {0}", splitUri[splitUri.Length - 1]); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in po.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).HasLineInfo() ? ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5) : "", ((IXmlLineInfo)e).HasLineInfo() ? ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition.ToString() : "No Line Information"); ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" + Environment.NewLine & _ " " + Environment.NewLine & _ " " + Environment.NewLine & _ " " + Environment.NewLine & _ "" File.WriteAllText("Test.xml", markup) Dim po As XElement = XElement.Load("Test.xml", LoadOptions.SetBaseUri Or LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) ' add a node to the tree. ' the newly added node will not have line information. po.Element("Child2").AddAfterSelf(New XElement("Child3")) Dim splitUri() As String = po.BaseUri.Split("/"c) Console.WriteLine("BaseUri: {0}", splitUri(splitUri.Length - 1)) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In po.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ IIf(DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).HasLineInfo(), _ DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ ""), _ IIf(DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).HasLineInfo(), _ DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).LinePosition.ToString(), _ "No Line Information")) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` BaseUri: Test.xml Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child1 2 6 Child2 3 6 Child3 No Line Information Child4 4 6 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions None = int32(0)

summary.span: 不保留无关紧要的空白，也不加载基 URI 和行信息。

span.span: Does not preserve insignificant white space or load base URI and line information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions PreserveWhitespace = int32(1)

summary.span: 分析时保留无关紧要的空白。

span.span: Preserves insignificant white space while parsing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions SetBaseUri = int32(2)

summary.span: 从 请求基 URI 信息，并通过 属性使此信息可用。

span.span: Requests the base URI information from the , and makes it available via the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Linq.LoadOptions SetLineInfo = int32(4)

summary.span: 从 请求行信息并通过 上的属性使此信息可用。

span.span: Requests the line information from the and makes it available via properties on .
